item.title: Wolves got summer transfers 'wrong' - club execs
item.description: Wolves got their transfer business "wrong" in the summer, says technical director Matt Jackson - while under-fire executive chairman Jeff Shi empathis...

item.title: How far will Trump go in his “war” with Venezuela?
item.description: And what’s behind the US seizure of a Venezuelan oil tanker?

item.title: I'm learning a new football language - Rashford
item.description: Marcus Rashford speaks to BBC Sport Spanish football reporter Elizabeth Conway about how he is settling into life with Barcelona.

item.title: Ex-Abercrombie & Fitch CEO fit to stand trial, prison officials say
item.description: Mike Jeffries, who was ruled "mentally incompetent" by a court, is now competent to stand trial, medical experts declare after a forensic evaluation.

item.title: Why is flu so bad this winter - and should you buy a vaccine?
item.description: Flu has come early this year, and experts predict it could be a particularly nasty season.
